name: DetectedIssue
title: DetectedIssue
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Clinical Decision Support)
description: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. Drug-drug interaction, Ineffective treatment frequency, Procedure-condition conflict, etc.

elements.name: DetectedIssue
elements.description: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifier associated with the detected issue record.

elements.name: status
elements.description: Indicates the status of the detected issue.

elements.name: code
elements.description: Identifies the general type of issue identified.

elements.name: severity
elements.description: Indicates the degree of importance associated with the identified issue based on the potential impact on the patient.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: Indicates the patient whose record the detected issue is associated with.

elements.name: identifiedDateTime
elements.description: The date or period when the detected issue was initially identified.

elements.name: identifiedPeriod
elements.description: The date or period when the detected issue was initially identified.

elements.name: author
elements.description: Individual or device responsible for the issue being raised. For example, a decision support application or a pharmacist conducting a medication review.

elements.name: implicated
elements.description: Indicates the resource representing the current activity or proposed activity that is potentially problematic.

elements.name: evidence
elements.description: Supporting evidence or manifestations that provide the basis for identifying the detected issue such as a GuidanceResponse or MeasureReport.

elements.name: detail
elements.description: A textual explanation of the detected issue.

elements.name: reference
elements.description: The literature, knowledge-base or similar reference that describes the propensity for the detected issue identified.

elements.name: mitigation
elements.description: Indicates an action that has been taken or is committed to reduce or eliminate the likelihood of the risk identified by the detected issue from manifesting.
